titleInfo.title: Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass

mods.abstract: Black and white full-length portrait of Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass outside in front of their tour bus. A handwritten note at the bottom of the photo says, "Size as is leave bus off (out line)."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
